formalpara.title: Figure 5.
formalpara.para: A) AFLP fingerprint pattern of individual BAC clones using HindIII/Mse-I primer combination. Each lane represents the fingerprint for a single BAC clone. The arrows at the top and bottom of the gel indicates the region of the fingerprint used for analysis. B) FPC v6.2 contig window displaying a horizontal representation of a representative contig (Soderlund et al., 1997). Reprinted from Srinivasan et al.
